message.entry: Inputs with more than two dimensions are not supported.
Displays input matrix as an image

MatrixViewer cannot accept a bus as its input signal. Insert a Bus to Vector conversion block in the signal path or extract signals using a Bus Selector block. To view the options associated with this message, in the Configuration Parameters dialog box, select Diagnostics > Connectivity; under Buses, see Bus signal treated as vector.
The input data type must be double precision, single precision, or fixed point.
